mapper.insert: insert reading_log (book_ref, log_title, date, page, chapter, review, log_image, hashtag) values (#{book_ref}, #{log_title}, #{date}, #{page}, #{chapter}, #{review}, #{log_image}, #{hashtag})
mapper.update: update reading_log set log_title = #{log_title}, date = #{date}, page = #{page}, chapter = #{chapter}, review = #{review}, log_image = #{log_image}, hashtag = #{hashtag} where log_idx = #{log_idx}
mapper.select:
select * from reading_log where
book_title
author
publisher
genre
like '%' #{searchKey} '%'
